articles.title: Ultrahigh-mobility semiconducting epitaxial graphene on silicon carbide - Nature.com
articles.description: Semiconducting epigraphene aligned with single-crystal silicon carbide substrates has a band gap of 0.6  eV and room temperature mobilities 20 times larger than that of other two-dimensional semiconductors, making it suitable for nanoelectronics.
